Package eu.lindenbaum.maven.util

Interface Summary
ErlConstants Defines Erlang related constants.
Observer A class interested in the result of an Process.
Predicate<T> An interface for predicates.
Processor Defines a class processing an String input.
 

Class Summary
ErlUtils Containing utilities related to erlang code execution.
FileUtils Containing utilities related to file handling.
MavenUtils Containing utilities related to maven plugins/projects.
StreamGobbler Reads all input from an InputStream saving it into a (line based) buffer.
TarGzArchiver An archiver that can create gzipped tar archives using the erlang erl_tar module.
TarGzUnarchiver An unarchiver that can extract gzipped tar archives using the erlang erl_tar module.
